attributes.action: supply emergency funding for the immediate rebuild of St Andrew's School - Chinnor. OX9 4PU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This primary school consists of two temporary buildings that were originally erected in 1963. The buildings are now dilapidated and suffer with serious drainage problems, damp and flooding.
In the interests of retaining our excellent teaching staff and give the children a school they can safely learn in, please sign our petition.
